name: The Daily Grinder
description:
The Daily Grinder

As part of demonic middle management, you are tasked with managing sheep placed on the line for ritual sacrifice. Pleasing the demon lord M is a two step process: First the sheep must be ground up, then their meat chunks must be brought to the sacrificial funnel for processing and offering. Gaining M's favor will grant you the power necessary for more efficient slaughter, but beware -- such power can easily get out of hand... 

Made as part of a game-a-week experimental game design class at RPI. The theme of the week was "Ritual"

--------------------------------------------------

For best experience, use full screen mode.

--------------------------------------------------

Matt Bonnecaze - Programmer

Max Kenny - Juice Artist, Programmer

Jakob Eneman - Artist

--------------------------------------------------
